info.name: Careers NIT Kurukshetra — API
info.description:
Complete API collection for the NIT Kurukshetra Recruitment Portal.

Setup:
1. Set `baseUrl` = http://localhost:8000/api/v1
2. After login, copy the `accessToken` from response and set it as collection variable
3. Set `appId` to a valid draft application ID
